title: EvalRecord
description: A single eval result record capturing the outcome of an autonomous task execution, including the prompt, model, score, timing, and any human interventions.

id.description: Unique identifier for this eval record (UUID v4 recommended).

schemaVersion.description: Schema version for forward compatibility (semver, e.g. "1.0.0").

originalPrompt.description: The task prompt that was given to the agent.

modelVersion.description: Specific model version string for reproducibility.

score.description: Numeric score between 0 and 1 (inclusive). Preserves full granularity; use scoreBand for human-readable interpretation.

scoreBand.description: The rubric band label derived from the score.

timeSeconds.description: Wall-clock time in seconds for task completion.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 datetime string when the eval was recorded.

interventionRequired.description: Whether any human intervention was required during the task.

interventionCount.description: Number of distinct human interventions during the task.

interventionDetails.description: Brief description of each human intervention.

rationale.description: Free-text rationale from the LLM judge explaining the score.

issueId.description: Linear issue identifier (e.g. "HOK-697"), if the task was issue-based.

prUrl.description: Pull request URL, if the task produced a PR.

metadata.description: Optional extensibility bag for additional metadata.
